messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2803
messages.msgSnippet: ... Pam, Don t appologize for the off-topicality.  It s probably the most educational assessment of a real courtroom I ve read in a long time.  It s also one
messages.messageBody:
1/7/03 05:34:

> This was a really interesting case. Below is an email I sent to
> some friends after the trial was over (my apologies for the off-
> topicality ;)
>
> Pam

Pam,

Don't appologize for the off-topicality. It's probably the most educational
assessment of a real courtroom I've read in a long time. It's also one of
the most painful things I've read lately.

Thank you for doing what most citizens seem interested in getting out of,
and obviously doing it well. As someone who's always had an excuse to get
out of jury duty (I've never been living even remotely close to Illinois
when called!), I appreciate that.

brenda
